items.title: Toyota reveals new name, upgraded tech for its sole U.S. EV
items.content: Toyota's redesigned EV will be called the "bZ" and offer notable increases in EV technologies and capabilities.
items.contentSnippet: Toyota's redesigned EV will be called the "bZ" and offer notable increases in EV technologies and capabilities.

items.title: Trump's plan to slash drug prices may struggle to get off the ground – here's what to know
items.content: Health policy experts said it is still unclear how much prices will go down, which medicines will be impacted and whether the effort can be implemented at all.
items.contentSnippet: Health policy experts said it is still unclear how much prices will go down, which medicines will be impacted and whether the effort can be implemented at all.

items.title: McDonald's announces plans to hire 375,000 workers with Trump Labor secretary
items.content: Through its company-owned and franchised restaurants, McDonald's is one of the nation's largest private employers.

items.title: Toy stocks rally after Chinese tariffs slashed to 30%
items.content: Shares of Mattel, Hasbro, Jakks and Funko rallied on Monday after the U.S. agreed to temporarily reduce tariffs on China.
items.contentSnippet: Shares of Mattel, Hasbro, Jakks and Funko rallied on Monday after the U.S. agreed to temporarily reduce tariffs on China.

items.title: FAA launches Newark airport task force with Verizon, L3Harris executives
items.content: The Trump administration announced an emergency task force of executives from Verizon, L3Harris and the FAA to fix the communication issues at Newark airport.
items.contentSnippet: The Trump administration announced an emergency task force of executives from Verizon, L3Harris and the FAA to fix the communication issues at Newark airport.

items.title: NBC taps Michael Jordan as NBA contributor
items.content: In July, NBC inked an 11-year deal with the NBA to broadcast games across NBC Sports and Peacock starting this fall.
items.contentSnippet: In July, NBC inked an 11-year deal with the NBA to broadcast games across NBC Sports and Peacock starting this fall.

items.title: Trump signs order aiming to cut some U.S. drug prices to match lower ones abroad
items.content: The order is a blow to the pharmaceutical industry, which is already bracing for Trump's planned tariffs on prescription drugs.
items.contentSnippet: The order is a blow to the pharmaceutical industry, which is already bracing for Trump's planned tariffs on prescription drugs.

items.title: GM hires ex-Tesla, Aurora exec as chief product officer
items.content: GM has hired Sterling Anderson, a former Tesla executive and co-founder of autonomous vehicle company Aurora Innovation, as its chief product officer.
items.contentSnippet: GM has hired Sterling Anderson, a former Tesla executive and co-founder of autonomous vehicle company Aurora Innovation, as its chief product officer.

items.title: Fox streaming service to be called Fox One, launch before NFL season
items.content: Fox CEO Lachlan Murdoch announced on Monday the media company's upcoming streaming service, named Fox One, will launch ahead of the NFL season.
items.contentSnippet: Fox CEO Lachlan Murdoch announced on Monday the media company's upcoming streaming service, named Fox One, will launch ahead of the NFL season.

items.title: Walgreens doubles down on prescription-filling robots to cut costs, free up pharmacists amid turnaround
items.content: Walgreens is expanding the number of its retail stores served by its micro-fulfillment centers as it works to turn itself around and prepares to go private.
items.contentSnippet: Walgreens is expanding the number of its retail stores served by its micro-fulfillment centers as it works to turn itself around and prepares to go private.

items.title: Trump's trade war is giving renewed importance to advertising Upfronts

items.title: A rare platinum Rolex is heading to auction and could fetch $1.7 million
items.content: A rare 1999 platinum Rolex Daytona, a one-of-a-kind private commission, could fetch $1.7 million at Sotheby’s as luxury watch demand surges globally.
items.contentSnippet: A rare 1999 platinum Rolex Daytona, a one-of-a-kind private commission, could fetch $1.7 million at Sotheby’s as luxury watch demand surges globally.

items.title: Newark air traffic controllers lost contact with planes again in overnight outage
items.content: Air traffic controllers in charge of Newark again lost contact with planes on Friday, the FAA said.

items.title: Something 'striking' is happening with apartment renters

items.title: ESPN will call its forthcoming flagship streaming app simply 'ESPN,' sources say
items.content: ESPN decided to name the streaming application "ESPN" to simplify what has become a confusing streaming landscape.

items.title: Candy giant Ferrero adds American twists to Nutella, Ferrero Rocher to fuel U.S. growth
items.content: Ferrero has been investing in growing its U.S. sales for the last decade through an acquisition spree and introducing its iconic brands to consumers stateside.

items.title: Startup Teal Health wins FDA approval for at-home test for cervical cancer screening
items.content: In clinical trials, the accuracy of self-testing with Teal's wand matched that of a cancer screening performed in a doctor's office.

items.title: Art market offers investors 'escape' from volatile stocks, Christie's CEO says

items.title: Why U.S. air traffic control is stretched so thin — and the fight to fix it

items.title: Used vehicle pricing barometer jumps to highest level since 2023 amid auto tariffs
